name: Knee Chest
descr:
Designed for Gonstead spinal adjustment of patient in knee chest (kneeling) position.

Sturdy construction of all components prevents loosening of screws, tightening of hinges, warping and/or buckling of frame, or defective operation of moving parts. Knee chest table made on wooden base with special padding beneath patientÂ´s knees. Padding on head-piece design to protect patient against breast or chest pressure. Headpiece adjusts to four positions.
